features: PERFECT SET FOR BACK TO COLLEGE: Best gift for new college students, grads, newlyweds, or anyone setting up a first time kitchen; A great set for those who know their way around a kitchen as it is or for newbie chefs just learning the ropes

OPTIMAL SHARPNESS KITCHEN KNIVES: Never needs sharpening blades have micro serrations that make cutting easy; Blades are crafted from superior high carbon stainless steel for strength, durability and precision results
NON SLIP HANDLES: Handles are crafted triple riveted poly for strength and durability and feature a textured, non slip finish that provide a sure, safe grip while cutting

ONE PIECE VALUE KITCHEN KNIFE AND TOOL SET: This high piece count set includes an 8 inch chef knife, 8 inch bread knife, 5 inch Santoku, 5.5 inch serrated utility knife, 4 inch utility knife, 3.5 inch Paring knife, (6) 4.5 inch steak knives, all purpose kitchen shear, set of 5 measuring spoons, 3 Spatulas, and a wood storage block
EASY CARE: Hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent; Rinse and dry immediately; Limited lifetime warranty
Farberware is the #1 selling cutlery brand in the U.S. (Source: The NPD Group, Inc./Retail Tracking Service. 52 weeks ending March 2016)
This set includes 8 inch chef, 8 inch slicer, 5 inch Santoku, 4.5 inch utility, 4 inch utility, 3.5 inch parer, 6 4.5 inch steak, 5 measuring spoons, and 3 spatulas
Essential cutlery pieces never needs sharpening blades with high carbon stainless steel blades for strength and durability
Perfectly balanced for precision and reliability
The cutlery in this set should be hand-washed only. Hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately.
body.description: Providing all the essentials in one sleek collection, The Farberware 'never needs sharpening' 22 Piece triple rivet stainless steel knife block set with kitchen tool set makes a thoughtful gift idea for college grads, newlyweds, or anyone setting up a first time kitchen. Just as useful for those who know their way around a kitchen as it is for newbie chefs just learning the Ropes, The set offers the full range of cutlery needed to start slicing, dicing, and chopping away. An attractive wood block comes included to ensure safe storage of all the pieces and to keep the collection within easy reach on the countertop. Each spatula is features a flexible head with a durable handle. The knife blades feature Farberware 'never needs sharpening' Edge each blade has micro serrations that make cutting easy. Blades are crafted from superior high carbon stainless steel for strength, durability and precision results. Handles are crafted triple riveted poly for strength and durability and feature a textured, non slip finish that provide a sure, safe grip while cutting. Washing by hand is recommended instead of the dishwasher; Full dry after washing to give allow for many years of optimum use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the money it's a solid set! You're not going to impress anyone but it's good enough
reviews.reviewText: So you may have searched for 'knife set in block', arranged by price and this was one of the first couple. And you might think "Well does it suck?" There's a couple poor reviews buried in here saying these knives aren't even sharp and can't cut any better than butter knives. That is definitely not my experience. They are not GREAT knives but they certainly cut, and for my little needs - things like I need to cut some cheese or some bread or dice up some chicken - they're fine! If you're a super cook who does half an hr of prep before every meal you might want something a little more higher grade but for Joe Average they'll do. And at the price point they are a steal.The scissors that came with the set are just super super excellent by the way, probably separately a pair of scissors like that would be 8 bucks by themselves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great knife set for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have owned a set of these Farberware knives that lasted me many years, now time for a new set as one knife just broke. The other knives are still in great shape. A couple of steak knives have gone missing over time with moving, so I wanted a nice new set. Overall, I like this new set very much, BUT, the quality on a few of the items is not as good as it was on my original set which happens when companies cut corners to save money so the updated products. Here are some issues I found: The Boning shears are not as good quality as original. The handle feels cheap and they don't seem as sturdy. Not sure if they will handle boning a chicken or any other very well may hurt hands. I am keeping my original shears as they are much better and still in great shape. The Bread Knife has been replaced with a slicing knife. The bread knife was a great knife to have and to do away with it for a slicing knife (which I am guessing means bread BUT they cannot call it a bread knife any more as the edge is NOT serrated like a true bread knife (The original was and it was amazing so I am keeping the original). And, the Santoku knife is not slightly rounded like a real Santoku blade normally is, the blade is completely flat and doesn't seem to have the stay sharp edge so I will wait and see how that lasts or if will be hard to use due to shape and if will need sharpening. But, overall.. Nice to have a fresh set of knives. I don't think people would notice the small issues I have if they never owned the original set. The original set had a nice oval stainless steel plate with the name Farberware on it too, which shows that the quality and workmanship on these knives has diminished over time. Regardless, I still definitely recommend this set. Worth every dollar!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this is a great gift idea for just about anyone on your list. this also looks awesome in the kitchen no matter where you place it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Knife Set
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this knife set as a college student for my apartment and its been a game changer! The quality is good for the price and the knives are easy to clean. It doesn't take up much room on my kitchen counter, which is a plus, so I would definitely recommend this for people with smaller kitchens or who are just getting into cooking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Starter Kitchen Knife Set
reviews.reviewText: The value on this set of knifes is really good. They are well made with non-slip plastic handles and you get a number of accessories in the set. How did Farberware do it and make the price point? Two ways: the included knife block is rough finished and the knives are of a higher gauge (thinner) metal so they do not have the heft of a substantial higher grade knife. The weight of a knife can make a difference to someone with more experience and let the weight of the blade do some of the work. Not the case with these. But they are sharp, they cut well and clean easily. If you need a comprehensive set of knives now and on a budget, this is a great choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great replacement set
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this item because my old set was beginning to decline in appearance and functionality. This new set has all of the right pieces to make a great replacement for it. You don't know how bad the old is getting until you use the new! I like the feel and look of these knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp knives and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I love how sharp these knives are.
It’s a gift now gives yet

reviews.reviewerName: Luciana amei , e chegou rápido e com total segurança!
reviews.reviewText: Utilidade na cozinha, churrasco perfeito com excelente corte!

Me gustó mucho el juego de cuchillos, se ven muy lindos y están resistentes. A pesar de que son tipo sierra cortan muy bien. Las tijeras se ven frágiles pero hasta el momento han resistido muy bien y tienen excelente filo. La relación calidad precio es la adecuada.
Apenas voy a estrenarlo pero muy lindos
